item.title: Data from: Habitat management alters thermal opportunity

item.title: Data from Critical thermal limits affected differently by developmental and adult thermal fluctuations

item.title: Data from The interaction between predation risk and food ration on behavior and morphology of Eurasian perch
item.description: Sources Background Reproducibility key Caveats Reproducibility Figure 1/Table 1 (Condition and Length) Condition index Table 1 Tukey Contrasts Figure 2/Table 2 (Behavior) Table 2 Morphometrics Post-publication review Sources Svanbäck R, Zha Y, Brönmark C, Johansson F (2017) The interaction between predation risk and food ration on behavior and morphology of Eurasian perch. Ecology and Evolution 7(20): 8567-8577. https://doi.org/10.1002/ece3.3330 Svanback R, Zha Y, Brönmark C, Johansson F (2017) Data from: The interaction between predation risk and food ration on behavior and morphology of Eurasian perch.
